mapper.select: SELECT fr.id as id, fr.template_name as templateName, fr.spu_location as spuLocation, fr.default_free_price as defaultFreePrice, fr.delivery_deadline as deliveryDeadline, fr.default_first_num as defaultFirstNum, fr.default_first_money as defaultFirstMoney, fr.default_continue_num as defaultContinueNum, fr.default_continue_money as defaultContinueMoney, fr.gmt_create as gmtCreate, fr.gmt_update as gmtUpdate FROM kxmall_freight_template fr, kxmall_sku sk, kxmall_spu sp WHERE sp.freight_template_id = fr.id and sk.spu_id = sp.id and sk.id = #{skuId}
